blogs.title: Why I Make Music
blogs.excerpt: A reflection on calling, craft, and the stories that shape us.
blogs.content:
I started making music long before I understood what it meant to write.
Music became a way to tell truths I couldn’t say aloud.

poems.title: The Still Voice
poems.excerpt: A whisper in the calm of midday — a small surrender.
poems.content:
The still voice calls
Beneath the clamor of my days —
I lean in, listen.

poems.title: Dawn Prayer
poems.content:
There is a light in the kettle's steam,
A soft liturgy of boiling water.

chapters.title: Chapter 1

chapters.title: Chapter 3
chapters.content: He kept the ticket stub and forgot to throw it away.
